contest-event.event-date:
May 1, 2026 M Eidgenössisches Musikfest (Championship Section)
Eidgenössisches Musikfest (Championship Section) 0 Set Test and Own Choice Eidgenössisches Musikfest eidgenossisches-musikfest-championship-section
Switzerland
Excellence
Interlaken, BE, Switzerland The various Contests were planned to happen on May 13th - 16th 2021 (exceptionally all on the same "long" Weekend). After COVID-19 and the following very uncertain Development and Discussions about an alternative/smaller Programme, all Contests had to be canceled completely finally. See: https://www.emf2021.ch/
Then Interlaken was ready and quickly confirmed to be host on the next possible Date - in May 2026.
35th Edition
March Parade now optional. Cup System (Entertainment Music) canceled.
temp. Info: > New Set Works will be written for all Sections by: Oliver Waespi (CS), Olivier Marquis (1st), Stephan Hodel (2nd), Manuel Renggli (3rd), Mario Bürki (4th) and Bertrand Moren (Entertainment).
May 1, 2018, 1:05 p.m. Oct. 2, 2020, 3:41 p.m.
